column3: â€œFor 27 years I suffered from migranes that would make go blind in one eye and completely disable me for up to 12 hours. The next day after my migrane I would have headache and feel like I had been out drinking all night. I have an allergic reaction to asprin and tylenol and ibuprofin does nothing to relieve my symptoms. Last year I decided to get my medical card and try marijuana, because nothing else had worked. The...â€

â€œ5 stars just for some amazing sleep! Besides that, it even tingles my nose as a nice hash would do. I'm dabbing the SHO & the flavor is hashy with definite pepper. Extremely smooth and has sent me off very smoothly to what's going to be a great day. Huge smile on my face. This isn't your typical couch lock indica. Although great for sleep it doesn't make it difficult to do chores. No anxiety at all (I'm prone to it.)...â€

â€œHOOKAHed HASHYBERRY before bed and WOW fun-flirty-sexy strain it is!!....very sensuous, touchy-touchy, explore, play, heal, be, make, love, feel, discover, grow, Come Together"...Enjoy and Be well Canna-Friends!!..... Oh

â€œThe smell and taste of this weed is unbelievable - like pure organic raspberries and blackberries that have been crushed in your hands. â€œI have been a serious smoker for 25 years. Hashberry is not for anyone without serious medical issues. Very strong, very very helpful with pain, and will knock out a rhino! Love it. Night night. Helps with with my numbness in my hands when i try to sleep. Miracle.â€

â€œThe first retail I bought, was hoping for something of a relaxing buzz. It helps me let go of stresses with the positive side effect of making me very horny. No complaints here! Recommended if you have a lot of time to kill. The buzz lasts for a long time even when it feels like it's waning after an hour it kicks back in with slightly less intensity.â€

â€œSmoking it as I write this. What made me excited about this strain is the fact that it's descended from a North American landrace strain. I was like

C...â€

â€œI suffered stroke froma brain tumor surgery. I was paralyzed on my left side and have brain clips in my head.  the brain clips hurt like the dickens!!!  having hash berry relieves my pains puts me in a very horny and funny mood  Love Thisâ€

â€œThis review is for the strain Chocolate Hashberry.

Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer.

Pros: Strong pain relief and euphoric head high. More hybrid than straight indica. Good if you need to eat, made me quite hungry. 

Cons: Dry eyes and some dry mouth. Little groggy after waking up, still felt some of the head effects.

Overall/Other: Smooth draw and exhale. Taste was sweet/earthy. I could taste a light hint...â€

â€œLight and clean high. Not too overpowering but you definitely feel it. Good for pain, headaches, nausea, IBS, muscle spasms.. Tingling sensation throughout the body. This would be a great strain to use for making cannabutter or cannamilk or if you smoke a lot of j's.â€

â€œReally like this strain a ton. Buds were conical shaped, light green with nice dark orange hairs and very frosty. Smell was extremely sweet and definitely smelled of blueberry muffins. I really dig the flavors of this one, notes of blueberry iced coffee. The high came on quickly behind the eyes, and tingly in the neck and shoulders. Made me very relaxed and good for pain relief. Worth headstashing this girl. Perfect ...â€
â€œThe cut I smoked was one of the absolute best strains for inducing heavy sleep. Really knocks you out and keeps you knocked out.â€
â€œGreat relaxing high. A night time or relaxing time strain. Nice sweet and berry flavour. Bag appeal buds with loads of tricomes. Grown indoors in soil with organic nutes.â€
â€œTried this for the first time the other day and I love it!  Def one of my fav indicas.  Doesn't make me sleepy or give me that couch lock feeling.  Makes me feel really happy and uplifted.â€

â€œNow, as the name states, I'm more of a Sativa guy. This Indica was quite amazing though. It hit me hard and was almost disorienting. It was great stuff and helped me sleep quite well. I really enjoyed the great perspective this strain put my mind into. I definitely recommend.â€

â€œI tried it alone and decided I like it more when I mix it with a little CBD from another strain. I have anxiety really bad, so when I get too high I have problems staying calm. So, with the ability to use a high CBD strain with it, this is a really good strain for me.

Kind of separates me from my mind clutter for a while and instead I can focus on different things that are less stressful. Very calming in that way.â€
